objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='grad1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#E8F0F8;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#D9E6F2;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='grad2' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#3D5A80;stop-opacity:0.7'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#3D5A80;stop-opacity:0'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#grad1)'/><rect x='40' y='40' width='1000' height='1000' rx='20' stroke='#98C1D9' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/><rect x='60' y='60' width='960' height='960' rx='15' stroke='#98C1D9' stroke-width='1' fill='none'/><path d='M0,300 C150,250 300,350 450,300 C600,250 750,350 900,300 C1050,250 1200,350 1350,300 L1350,0 L0,0 Z' fill='#98C1D9' opacity='0.3'/><path d='M0,780 C150,830 300,730 450,780 C600,830 750,730 900,780 C1050,830 1200,730 1350,780 L1350,1080 L0,1080 Z' fill='#98C1D9' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='300' cy='300' r='200' fill='#3D5A80' opacity='0.05'/><circle cx='800' cy='800' r='150' fill='#3D5A80' opacity='0.05'/><rect x='90' y='90' width='900' height='900' rx='10' fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='0.6'/></svg>

objects.text:
Sleek Design Meets Advanced Technology
Multiple Drying Cycles for All Fabrics
Energy-Efficient Ventless Technology
Perfect for Spaces Without External Venting

product_details.name: Insignia High-Efficiency Digital Ventless Dryer - Modern Laundry Solution
product_details.description:
• ✨ Sleek white design with modern digital display and intuitive controls
• 🎯 Multiple drying cycles including Normal, Heavy Duty, Delicate, and Quick Dry
• ⚡ Energy-efficient ventless condensing technology
• 🔧 Easy-access maintenance panel and lint filter system
• 📱 Digital LED display with time remaining and cycle status
• 🌟 Large capacity drum with dark glass door for visibility
• ⚙️ Adjustable temperature settings for various fabric types
• 💨 Advanced moisture sensing technology for precise drying
• 🔄 Multiple drying options including Air Fluff and Wrinkle Prevent
• 🏠 Perfect for apartments, condos, and spaces without external venting

banner_details:
This banner design showcases a modern and clean layout for promoting a home appliance product. It features a large central product image on the right, allowing the item to dominate the visual field. The left section is text-focused with a bold, futuristic heading (`heading`) and a strong subheading (`subheading`) to grab attention. Below, four concise feature lines (`description`) outline product highlights. Price is emphasized in a large, bold font (`price`), and a prominent call-to-action button (`cta_button`, `cta`) encourages engagement. Subtle layered background patterns and a light, gradient-rich palette add a sleek, professional aesthetic.  

**Color Palette:**  
- Deep Blue: #3D5A80  
- Navy Gray: #293241  
- Light Blue: #98C1D9  
- White: #FFFFFF  
- Gradient Background: #E8F0F8 to #D9E6F2
product_color: The product image features a modern dryer with a sleek and minimalist color palette, perfect for a clean and tech-centered advertisement banner. The base white color (#FFFFFF) dominates, conveying purity and simplicity. The black door frame and control panel contrast boldly (#1C1C1C), adding visual depth and a sense of technology. Accents like the chrome knob (#C0C0C0) and small blue and red temperature indicator lines (#0096FF and #FF341C respectively) inject subtle energy, enhancing a high-tech feel. These colors blend smoothly through sharp, defined transitions, making each element stand out. This palette supports a clean, futuristic ad theme with high visual clarity.
